projects.name: Cinema FK
projects.description: Final project: A fullstack project of a cinema where you book seats to your selected movie

projects.name: Cinema FK - backend
projects.description: Final project: A fullstack project of a cinema where you book seats to your selected movie

projects.name: Happy Thoughts API
projects.description: Fullstack project: Post your happy thought. A twitter-like web site with an API I built using Mongo DB

projects.name: Song API
projects.description: A RESTful API to fetch songs from spotify. I created multiple endpoints - and I flexed my muscles for the last one by using the aggregate methodology.

projects.name: Family Fitness
projects.description: A collaboration with a UX-design student (Oda Archer). She created the design and a prototype. We used Figma during the designer handoff. This project is in progress

projects.name: The Tic Tac Toe quiz
projects.description: This quiz was constructed using the Zustand library to store global state. It is a Tic Tac Toe meets memory-quiz. A group project with Klaudia Wróblewska, Andrej Kavrzic, Manne Johansson and Isaac Kamran

projects.name: This portfolio
projects.description: Created from a given design using Figma. Work in progress.

projects.name: The drink survey
projects.description: Pair project to learn controlled forms, I worked with Carolina Luna. We created a form which suggests a drink based on the form selections

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: The weather app was a project done in a pair together with Klaudia Wróblewska using an API. I am especially proud of the raining effect if it's currently raining.

projects.name: Guess who game
projects.description: I created a Guess who game as a first task to implement Javascript.

projects.name: News site project
projects.description: The first project for Technigo. I created a layout for a News Site called Yogini News
